meanings.definition: A salt or ester of phenol.
meanings.sent1: I added a pinch of phenoxide to the solution.
meanings.sent2: The phenoxide dissolved easily in the solvent.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous scientist accidentally spilled phenoxide all over the lab.
meanings.sent4: Her love for chemistry was like a bubbling beaker of phenoxide.
meanings.sent5: The bright red color of the phenoxide stood out in the mixture.

meanings.sent1: The phenoxide reacted with the acid to form a new compound.
meanings.sent2: Researchers studied the properties of the phenoxide in the experiment.
meanings.sent3: The phenoxide anion threw a party in the test tube.
meanings.sent4: The phenoxide danced around the solution, changing its color.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the phenoxide looked like a tiny starburst.
